font.span: Welcome to Elmwood Local Schools, where we increase student academic achievement by connecting students to the power and possibilities of learning.Â Our goal is to raise hope, trust, and confidence in the Elmwood Schools through effective and efficient collaboration.

span.font: Email Information - elmwoodschools.org forwards to elmls.net.Â Therefore both email domains work for Elmwood Schools.
